title: conflict with fastText
body_html:
Issue description

It seems that fastText is conflict with pytorch.

Code example

import fastText   
import torch

System Info

bash: 行 1: 15992 段错误 env "PYTHONUNBUFFERED"="1" "PYTHONPATH"="/root/.pycharm_helpers/pycharm_matplotlib_backend:/root/fastText:/root/fastText/ae:/root/fastText/temp" "PYCHARM_HOSTED"="1" "JETBRAINS_REMOTE_RUN"="1" "PYCHARM_MATPLOTLIB_PORT"="51582" "PYTHONIOENCODING"="UTF-8" /root/anaconda3/bin/python -u /root/fastText/temp.py
[environment]

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): pip
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source): No
  • OS: CentOS Linux 7 (Core)
  • PyTorch version: 0.4.1
  • Python version: 3.6.5
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: No
  • GPU models and configuration: No
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 4.8.5
  • CMake version: 3.6.2
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries:
    • fasttext 0.8.22

I substitute all pip3 in collect_env.py to pip because I use anaconda and my command to use pip3 is pip.

Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: CentOS Linux 7 (Core)
GCC version: (GCC) 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-11)
CMake version: version 3.6.2

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] numpy (1.14.3)
[pip] numpydoc (0.8.0)
[pip] torch (0.4.1)
[pip] torchfile (0.1.0)
[pip] torchnet (0.0.4)
[pip] torchvision (0.2.1)
[conda] faiss-cpu                 1.3.0            py36_cuda0.0_1    pytorch
[conda] torch                     0.4.1                     <pip>
[conda] torchfile                 0.1.0                     <pip>
[conda] torchnet                  0.0.4                     <pip>
[conda] torchvision               0.2.1                     <pip>

body:
## Issue description

It seems that fastText is conflict with pytorch.

## Code example

```
import fastText   
import torch  
```

## System Info

`bash: 行 1: 15992 段错误 env "PYTHONUNBUFFERED"="1" "PYTHONPATH"="/root/.pycharm_helpers/pycharm_matplotlib_backend:/root/fastText:/root/fastText/ae:/root/fastText/temp" "PYCHARM_HOSTED"="1" "JETBRAINS_REMOTE_RUN"="1" "PYCHARM_MATPLOTLIB_PORT"="51582" "PYTHONIOENCODING"="UTF-8" /root/anaconda3/bin/python -u /root/fastText/temp.py`
[environment]
- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): pip
- Build command you used (if compiling from source): No
- OS: CentOS Linux 7 (Core)
- PyTorch version: 0.4.1
- Python version: 3.6.5
- CUDA/cuDNN version: No
- GPU models and configuration: No
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 4.8.5
- CMake version: 3.6.2
- Versions of any other relevant libraries:
  - fasttext 0.8.22

I substitute all `pip3` in collect_env.py to `pip` because I use anaconda and my command to use pip3 is pip.
```
Collecting environment information...
PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: CentOS Linux 7 (Core)
GCC version: (GCC) 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-11)
CMake version: version 3.6.2

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:

[pip] numpydoc (0.8.0)
[pip] torch (0.4.1)
[pip] torchfile (0.1.0)
[pip] torchnet (0.0.4)
[pip] torchvision (0.2.1)
[conda] faiss-cpu                 1.3.0            py36_cuda0.0_1    pytorch
[conda] torch                     0.4.1                     <pip>
[conda] torchfile                 0.1.0                     <pip>
[conda] torchnet                  0.0.4                     <pip>
[conda] torchvision               0.2.1                     <pip>
```
